channel.title: Comments on: Brian asks, “How can I use multiple monitors with my computer?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: tim patterson
item.dc:creator: tim patterson
item.description: Thanks for the quick answers, btw I like the entire layout for your monitors, that desk works well.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the quick answers, btw I like the entire layout for your monitors, that desk works well.
